name: 胡憲倫
objective: To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most essential tools for analyzing and assessing environmental issues, will be taught during the semester. Students will also learn about the popular LCA software SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as circular economy, net zero, carbon footprinting, carbon labeling, waste management, and eco-design, will also be practiced in the class.
schedule:
1.	Concept of Systems, Life Cycle, and Life Cycle Management
2.	Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment I: History, Development, and Applications
3.	Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment II: Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management
4.	Methodology of LCA: I. Goal and Scope Definition and Inventory Analysis
5.	LCA Software SimaPro Tutorial: Introduction and Practices (Make learning groups)
6.	Methodology of LCA-II. Inventory analysis
7.	Methodology of LCA-III. Methodology of Life Cycle Impact Assessment (LCIA)
8.	Methodology of LCA- IV. Uncertainty, Sensitivity Analysis, and Interpretation 
9.	Mid-term Exam
10.	Group report- LCA for one product or service 
11.	LCA Applications(I): Product and Process Ecodesign; Environmental Declarations and Carbon Labeling, etc.
12.	Special Topic: CBAM and Carbon Footprinting, Carbon Labeling, Environmental Footprinting, and Material Flow Cost Accounting (MFCA)
13.	Other Types of LCA (Eco-efficiency, MFCA, Social LCA, and Organizational LCA, etc.), and LCA Applications(II): Environmental Engineering Related Applications
14.	Quantitative Performance Assessment for Circular Economy 
15.	Company Tour Visit (Taiwan Cement)
16.	LCA Outlook and Latest Development: Net Zero and Biodiversity; Natural Capital Accounting
17.	Team Project Presentation
18.	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
 Participation and Homework：30 %   Exams：30 %
 Team Project (Report and Oral Presentation)： 40 %

consultation: Every Wednesday afternoon 13:00~17:00, or by e-mail appointment.

name: 郭建宏
objective:
本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.
